rooms.description: A combined open-plan space for living and cooking, designed with Art Deco style elements. Incorporates a central island with geometric patterns and vintage lighting fixtures.
Dedicated workspace located adjacent to the living area to facilitate easy access while maintaining privacy, equipped with natural light and accessible features for wheelchair users.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars, roll-in shower, and non-slip flooring to ensure safety.
Small storage space for cleaning supplies and appliances.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance with a gradual ramp.
Spacious balcony integrated into each bedroom for ventilation and natural lighting, designed to be accessible with handrails.

rooms.description: Master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony for natural light and ventilation, designed according to Vastu principles with the head of the bed oriented towards the east.
Second bedroom with a private balcony and accessible features ensuring ease of movement.
Third bedroom with integrated balcony designed for both privacy and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines.
Additional accessible bathroom on the first floor, complete with non-slip tiles and grab bars.

openings.description: Spacious balcony integrated into each bedroom for natural lighting and ventilation, ensuring wheelchair accessibility through the use of ramps where necessary.
Staircase designed with handrails and non-slip surfaces to facilitate safe movement between floors. A ramp is provided as an alternative for wheelchair access.
